Reviews.Title: “First visit of Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Patrik1987
Reviews.Content: time uae happy hotel received recommendation girl friend hotel couple ago staff helpful pleasant arrived earlier check fee

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: FineFoodConnoisseur
Reviews.Content: pretty average hotel chose proximity 1520 minutes airport access metro stayed suites nice downside towels clean moved lower floor close hotel disco pretty loud breakfast average dinning ambience loved complimentary airport transfers

Reviews.Title: “Poor Hotel - Old and Uncomfortable”
Reviews.Author: EZT
Reviews.Content: truly bad property reception unimpressive smallish dated tired basic furniture ancient tv set inadequate bathroom facilities hotel remains untouched 1520 tv channel selection extremely limited amenities carpet dirty beds squeak lot favour nice free ride airport morning pity hotel location modern real dubai mixture shops real restaurants decent mall walking distance course hotels lotus category lotus resort top cheap offer

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and clean!”
Reviews.Author: Pejman-Trip
Reviews.Content: enjoyed lovely disco special happening careful price refrigrator dont try reach pool nice water

Reviews.Title: “The most terrible hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: shabnamhori
Reviews.Content: stayed seven days definitely 4 star hotel maybe 2 star top food eatable crowded noisy restaurants dishes empty ate salad nice breakfast children screaming throwing food hated staying enjoy hotel bed comfortable it’s size tiny tv functioning rude staffs reception restaurant staff smiling hate hotel april 2010 nice hotel name wont wish enemies
